name: Space Hotel
description: One of your ship's engines breaks down while on a trade route. You are forced to make a landing in the nearest star system Merope, constellation Pleiades. Your task is to find a way to the main hangar and escape on the ship of those who remained there forever.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i3 2 Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon 6850 1Gb VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 860 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i5 3 Ghz Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon 6850 1Gb VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 860 MB available space
